extDescription.message: Complete proxy manager for Chrome. Create, edit, and switch between PAC scripts, manual proxies, and system configurations easily.

systemProxy.message: Use proxy settings from the operating system.

directModeHelp.message: In direct mode all connections are created directly, without any proxy involved.

autoDetectModeHelp.message: In Auto-detect mode, Chrome will automatically search for and download proxy settings using the WPAD protocol.

deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this script?

toggleProxyHint.message: Toggle proxy by clicking on the switch.

quickSwitchDescription.message: Enable quick switching between proxy configurations from the popup

noScriptsAvailable.message: No PAC scripts available. Add your first script to get started.

noQuickSwitchScripts.message: No quick switch scripts configured. Drag scripts here to enable quick switching.

noScriptsAvailableOptions.message: No scripts available. Click "Add New Script" to create your first PAC script.

useSameProxy.message: Use same proxy server for all protocols

mandatoryPacScript.message: Mandatory PAC script (prevent fallback to direct)

dropToAddQuickScripts.message: Drop here to add to quick scripts

dropToRemoveQuickScripts.message: Drop here to remove from quick scripts

dragScriptsHere.message: Drag scripts here to enable quick switching. Quick switch allows you to switch proxy by clicking the extension icon.

disableProxyOnStartupDescription.message: Start with proxy disabled each time the browser launches

deleteProxyMessage.message: Are you sure you want to delete "$1"? This action cannot be undone.

backupDescription.message: Download all proxy configurations and preferences as a JSON file

restoreDescription.message: Upload a backup file to restore configurations

proxyDisabledOnStartup.message: Proxy will be disabled on browser startup

proxyPersistOnStartup.message: Proxy state will persist on browser startup

quickSwitchEnabledStatus.message: ✓ Enabled – Click the extension icon to switch quickly

quickSwitchConfigsDescription.message: Drag proxies here for one-click access in the popup

extensionDescription.message: Chrome Extension for managing PAC (Proxy Auto-Config) scripts

bypassListPlaceholder.message:
Enter one pattern per line:
*.example.com
localhost
127.0.0.1
[::1]

tooltipQuickSwitchMode.message: Access favorite proxies instantly from the popup without opening settings

tooltipDisableOnStartup.message: This ensures proxies don't auto-enable when Chrome starts

tooltipDragToQuickSwitch.message: Drag proxy cards here to add them to Quick Switch for faster access

tooltipDragToRemove.message: Drag Quick Switch proxies here to remove them from the popup

tooltipKeyboardShortcut.message: Press Ctrl+N (Cmd+N on Mac) to quickly add a new proxy
